subject: Basketball
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
lead_paragraph: To complete his deal to buy the Nets, the Russian oligarch Mikhail D. Prokhorov will have to win the approval of at least 23 of the N.B.A.’s 30 owners, which might not be easy.
snippet: To complete his deal to buy the Nets, the Russian oligarch Mikhail D. Prokhorov will have to win the approval of at least 23 of the N.B.A.’s 30 owners, which might not be easy.
